title: Avengers: Endgame
plot: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

title: Avengers: Doomsday
plot: Plot under wraps.

title: The Avengers
plot: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

title: Avengers: Infinity War
plot: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

title: Avengers: Age of Ultron
plot: When Tony Stark and Bruce Banner try to jump-start a dormant peacekeeping program called Ultron, things go horribly wrong and it's up to Earth's mightiest heroes to stop the villainous Ultron from enacting his terrible plan.

title: The Avengers
plot: A quirky spy show of the adventures of eccentrically suave British Agent John Steed and his predominantly female partners.

title: Avengers Grimm
plot: When Rumpelstiltskin destroys the Magic Mirror and escapes to the modern world, the four princesses Cinderella, Sleeping Beauty, Snow White, and Rapunzel are sucked through the portal too. The four women now must save Earth.

title: Avengers: Secret Wars
plot: Plot Under Wraps

title: The Weather Man
plot: A Chicago weather man, separated from his wife and children, debates whether professional and personal success are mutually exclusive.

title: Weather Report
plot: David Lynch gives daily weather reports in Los Angeles.

title: Sex Weather
plot: After a night of drinks and an unexpected hookup, Sydney and Darrell spend the day in bed discussing life, love, and sex. Is it the start of something real or just a sexy afternoon?

title: Forecasting Love and Weather
plot: An office melodrama that depicts work life and love life of the people working in Korea Meteorological Administration which is hotter than tropical nights and more indispensable than local heavy rains.

title: When the Weather is Fine
plot: A story about forgiveness, healing and love taking place around a small book store in the countryside.

title: Weather Girl
plot: A Seattle weather girl freaks out on-air over her cheating boyfriend, the morning show anchor, and moves in with her little brother.

title: Stormy Weather
plot: The relationship between an aspiring dancer and a popular songstress provides a retrospective of the great African-American entertainers of the early 1900s.

title: Strange Weather
plot: in an effort to deal with the grief over the death of her son, a Georgia mother travels the back roads of the deep south to settle a score. A story of grief and forgiveness, of looking inward to find a way to move forward.

title: Weathering with You
plot: Set during a period of exceptionally rainy weather, high-school boy Hodaka Morishima runs away from his troubled rural home to Tokyo and befriends an orphan girl who can manipulate the weather.

title: Weathering with Me
plot: How does it feel to forget your own life? "Weathering With Me" depicts how dementia can erase the traces of what once were the most important moments of life.

title: The Batman
plot: When a sadistic serial killer begins murdering key political figures in Gotham, the Batman is forced to investigate the city's hidden corruption and question his family's involvement.

title: Batman
plot: The Dark Knight of Gotham City begins his war on crime with his first major enemy being Jack Napier, a criminal who becomes the clownishly homicidal Joker.

title: Batman Begins
plot: After witnessing his parents' death, Bruce learns the art of fighting to confront injustice. When he returns to Gotham as Batman, he must stop a secret society that intends to destroy the city.

title: Batman
plot: Follows the adventures of wealthy entrepreneur Bruce Wayne, also known as the Caped Crusade Batman and his young ward Dick Grayson also known as Batman's sidekick Robin the boy wonder as they battle evildoers in Gotham City.

title: Batman Returns
plot: While Batman deals with a deformed man calling himself the Penguin wreaking havoc across Gotham with the help of a cruel businessman, a female employee of the latter becomes the Catwoman with her own vendetta.

title: Batman: The Animated Series
plot: The Dark Knight battles crime in Gotham City.

title: Batman Forever
plot: Batman must battle former district attorney Harvey Dent, who is now Two-Face and Edward Nygma, The Riddler with help from an amorous psychologist and a young circus acrobat who becomes his sidekick, Robin.

title: Batman & Robin
plot: Batman and Robin try to keep their relationship together even as they must stop Mr. Freeze and Poison Ivy from freezing Gotham City.

title: Spider-Man
plot: After being bitten by a genetically-modified spider, a shy teenager gains spider-like abilities that he uses to fight injustice as a masked superhero and face a vengeful enemy.

title: Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse
plot: Miles Morales catapults across the multiverse, where he encounters a team of Spider-People charged with protecting its very existence. When the heroes clash on how to handle a new threat, Miles must redefine what it means to be a ...

title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
plot: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear.

title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
plot: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
plot: Peter Parker tries to stop Adrian 'The Vulture' Toomes from selling weapons made with advanced Chitauri technology while trying to balance his life as an ordinary high school student.

title: Spider-Man 3
plot: A strange black entity from another world bonds with Peter Parker and causes inner turmoil as he contends with new villains, temptations, and revenge.

title: Spider-Man: Beyond the Spider-Verse
plot: After leaving off from Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse, the story continues.

title: Spider-Man 2
plot: Peter Parker is beset with troubles in his failing personal life as he battles a former brilliant scientist named Otto Octavius.

title: Dumb and Dumber
plot: After a woman leaves a briefcase at the airport terminal, a dumb limo driver and his dumber friend set out on a hilarious cross-country road trip to Aspen to return it.

title: Dumb Money
plot: David vs. Goliath tale about everyday people who flipped the script on Wall Street and got rich by turning GameStop (the video-game store) into the world's hottest company.

title: Dumb and Dumber To
plot: 20 years since their first adventure, Lloyd and Harry go on a road trip to find Harry's newly discovered daughter, who was given up for adoption.

title: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
aka: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd (2003)
plot: Set back in the 80s when Harry met Lloyd in high school where they cross paths with a mean principal and a bunch of other outcasts much like themselves.

title: Dumb & Dahmer
plot: Jeffrey Dahmer, a serial killer, battles his murderous urges. A victim escapes but is returned by inept police, reflecting the absurdity surrounding law enforcement's handling of the case.

title: Dumbo
plot: A young elephant, whose oversized ears enable him to fly, helps save a struggling circus, but when the circus plans a new venture, Dumbo and his friends discover dark secrets beneath its shiny veneer.

title: Dumb and Dumber
plot: The continuing nutty adventures of Lloyd and Harry and their pet beaver, as they drive around the country in their Dogmobile.

title: Dumb
plot: A frustrated actress with a strong character, Shiri is 30 but seems much younger as everyone seems to be constantly reminding her in both her personal and professional lives.

title: Ghost
plot: After a young man is murdered, his spirit stays behind to warn his lover of impending danger, with the help of a reluctant psychic.

title: Ghost Whisperer
plot: Melinda Gordon, a newly married woman, possesses the gift of communicating with the dead. With her best friend Andrea's assistance, she helps the earthbound spirits to find peace and cross over.

title: Ghosts
plot: A young couple, Sam and Jay, inherit a haunted mansion and, unaware of their invisible housemates, plan to turn it into a B&B. Their lives become much more complicated after a fall causes Sam to see the ghosts. Based on the UK ser...

title: Ghost Rider
plot: When motorcycle rider Johnny Blaze sells his soul to the Devil to save his father's life, he is transformed into the Ghost Rider, the Devil's own bounty hunter, and is sent to hunt down sinners.

title: Ghost in the Shell
plot: In the near future, Major Mira Killian is the first of her kind: A human saved from a terrible crash, who is cyber-enhanced to be a perfect soldier devoted to stopping the world's most dangerous criminals.

title: Ghost in the Shell
plot: A cyborg policewoman and her partner hunt a mysterious and powerful hacker called the Puppet Master.

title: Ghost Ship
plot: A salvage crew discovers a long-lost 1962 passenger ship floating lifeless in a remote region of the Bering Sea, and soon notices that its long-dead inhabitants may still be on board.

title: Ghost World
plot: Two eccentric best friends graduate high school and respond to a man's romance-seeking newspaper ad as a gag, only to find their lives becoming increasingly complicated.

title: Deadpool & Wolverine
plot: Deadpool is offered a place in the Marvel Cinematic Universe by the Time Variance Authority, but instead recruits a variant of Wolverine to save his universe from extinction.

title: Deadpool
plot: A wisecracking mercenary gets experimented on and becomes immortal yet hideously scarred, and sets out to track down the man who ruined his looks.

title: Deadpool 2
plot: Foul-mouthed mutant mercenary Wade Wilson (a.k.a. Deadpool) assembles a team of fellow mutant rogues to protect a young boy with abilities from the brutal, time-traveling cyborg Cable.

title: Deadpool
plot: Deadpool is hired and smitten by the enigmatically psychotic Typhoid Mary. But who is his target?

title: Once Upon a Deadpool
plot: A kidnapped Fred Savage is forced to endure Deadpool's PG-13 rendition of Deadpool 2 as a Princess Bride-esque story that's full of magic, wonder and zero F's.

title: Deadpool: No Good Deed
plot: Deadpool sees an opportunity to save the day, but it doesn't go entirely as planned.

title: Deadpool Movie in Lego
plot: A shot-for-shot remake of the 2016 movie, Deadpool, created entirely out of Lego.

title: Deadpool
plot: With the help of Cable, Rogue, Wolverine and many other heroes, Deadpool must stop Mister Sinister, while trying to make his video game really awesome and going over budget countless times.
